definition.name: run-sqlpackage
definition.description: Runs SqlPackage command on a target database
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: action
inputs.description: Action parameter to run with SqlPackage. Supported values are: Publish, DeployReport, DriftReport, Script

inputs.name: sourcepath
inputs.description: The path where to look for the DACPAC file. If multiple files exists, all of them are processed

inputs.name: profile
inputs.description: The profile path to use during the execution. It has to be an xml file

inputs.name: database-server
inputs.description: Database server URL (without protocol). If not indicated in the publishing profile, it has to be indicated here.

inputs.name: database-name
inputs.description: Database name. If not indicated in the publishing profile, it has to be indicated here.

inputs.name: authtoken
inputs.description: The authentication token used to connect to the database, if credentials not indicated in the connection string

inputs.name: outputpath
inputs.description: The output folder where assets will be generated if any

inputs.name: outputfile
inputs.description: The output file name. The final name of the file will be [dacpac_name].[outputfile]
